name: COSY STUDIO
description: The coziness already hides in the name. The Cosy Studio is the compact starting point of your journey. Equipped with everything you need to feel good and with a view of the village and the impressive mountain scenery.

name: VISTA STUDIO
description: Large windows, lots of space and a modern design with an alpine touch. The lively Vista Studio is the perfect place to explore nature in small groups. The spacious living room has a large bathroom and is complemented by the terrace with panoramic views.
